Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.rounds

Class IngressHallSwapActionRound

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.rounds.IngressHallSwapActionRound
All Implemented Interfaces:
RoundInterface, Serializable
public class IngressHallSwapActionRound extends Object implements RoundInterface, Serializable
Class used to represent the round used to manage the actions a player can make after playing the expert card n.10
